text:
@aravosis Anti-Intellectualism is a growing disease in this country. It’s spreading faster than Covid-19 I fear.  

I beg to ask each and every one of these passionate “victims of crimes against humanity 🙄” if they took such a stand against the tyranny of “No shirt. No shoes. No service.
